title: Jungle Adventure Music Pack
description: 45 Tracks & 1 hour of Captivating Jungle Music
longDescription:
Introducing the Jungle Adventure Music Pack, a thrilling and immersive musical journey through the untamed wilderness! Full-length ending versions of original music tracks with useful loops and intros included.


Demos of the main versions of all the tracks included in the pack are available below:


YOUTUBE PREVIEW


This exciting new music pack is designed for developers who want to create an unforgettable jungle adventure experience for their players. Featuring a dynamic and evocative soundtrack that blends traditional instruments with modern digital effects, the Jungle Adventure Music Pack will transport your players to a world of exotic flora and fauna, mysterious ruins, and dangerous predators lurking around every corner: tribal rhythms, melodic percussions, atmospheric pan flutes and wooden instruments. Whether you're developing a platformer, a survival game, or an action-packed adventure, the Jungle Adventure Music Pack will add a new level of excitement and immersion to your project.


You can also use this music to promote your video game on Youtube and all the other social platforms. Fill out our form to clear any Content ID claim on your promotional videos: https://www.pinegroove.net/content_id_release_form/


INCLUDED WITH THIS PACK:


  • 11 unique music themes with elaborate full-length structure;
  • 45 WAV files, including full-length versions, loops and stingers (intros or outros);
  • 44 minutes of audio in 16 bit / 44.1 Khz format
technicalDetails:
Features:

  1.  Wild Jungle Adventure (main track, 3 loops, 1 stinger)
  2.  Wilderness Hunt (main track, 2 loops, 2 stingers)
  3.  Mysterious Jungle (main track, 2 loops, 1 stinger)
  4. Fun In The Jungle (main track, 3 loops, 2 stingers)
  5. Congo (main track, 2 loops, 1 stinger)
  6. Heart Of Africa (main track, 2 loops, 2 stingers)
  7. Defeated By The Jungle (main track, 1 loop)
  8. Scientific Inquiry (main track, 2 loops, 1 stinger)
  9. Documentary Of The Unexplored (main track, 2 loops, 1 stinger)
  10. Seeking Mind (main track, 2 loops, 1 stinger)
  11. Flavours Of India (main track, 2 loops, 1 stinger)

Number of Audio Wavs: 33

Number of Audio Cues: 33

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz/16 Bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 44:29

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: www.francescobiondimusic.com

Important/Additional Notes: if you want to clear a claim on your Youtube promotional video, please fill this form : https://www.pinegroove.net/content_id_release_form/
